name: Fix the bug
action: The following code has a bug. Fix it.

name: Rewrite the code
action: Rewrite the code to improve readability and maintainability.

name: Summarize the text
action: Write a short summary of the text.

name: Main points
action: Give the main points highlighted in the text.

name: Analyze Sentiment
action: Analyze the sentiment of the text.

name: Extract Keywords
action: Extract the main keywords from the text.

name: Identify Entities
action: Identify the named entities mentioned in the text.

name: Paraphrase
action: Rewrite the text in a different way while keeping the same meaning.

name: Check Grammar
action: Check the text for grammatical errors.

name: Summarize & Synthesize
action: Summarize multiple texts and synthesize the information into a single coherent text.
